name: Vauquer: La Finale
description:
This is my entry for the /r/RPGMaker and Lunatic Server collab Boss Creation Contest. It is also my first time messing with the combat in rpg maker, so some weirdness is sure to occur.

----

This is a boss battle at the end of a long rpg campaign. The two adventurers Anastasie and Delphine confront the lamia Victorine in a final battle!
